title: Fan club members arrested for Jallikattu protest Kamal Haasan calls it a political vendetta - Tamil Movie News
text: Kamal Haasan's instant reaction for verdict on Sasikala Actor Kamal Haasan has been very actively reacting to the recent political developments in Tamil Nadu for the past few weeks. He has been receiving bouquets from people and brickbats from ruling party politicians and their supporters for the same. Now in a shocking turn of events, one Sudhagar and a few other members of Kamal Haasan Rasigargal Narpani Iyakkam have been arrested in connection with Jallikattu protests held across the state last month. Reacting to this, Kamal has called it an act of 'Politcal vendetta." Here is a gist of what the legendary actor has said in a series of Tamil tweets. "I had decided to reduce my number of tweets and keep silent hoping that the people's justice will save the nation. Yesterday, Sudhagar and a few other members of our Iyakkam (organisation) have been arrested in for TN Jallikattu protests. This increases our reputation and also exposes the Political vendetta against us. At this time, members of our Iyakkam should be more patient and dignified. Continue to voice your opinion but do it in a measured manner. We should not give up our principle. Whichever party forms the Government, our job is to protect the public welfare. We will continue this pay-less job forever. They (rulers) will come and go often. Nation will be permanent." இனிமக்கள்நீதிநாடுகாக்கும். நான்கீச்சிடாமல்அடிநாதத்துடன்அடக்கிவாசிக்கவேநினைத்தேன். ஆனால்எம்இயக்கப்பொறுப்பாளரின்கைதுபேசவைக்கிறது — Kamal Haasan (@ikamalhaasan) February 22, 2017 TN ஜ.கட்டுப்போராட்டத்தில்எமதியக்கத்தின்சுதாகரும்சிலரும்நேற்றுகைதுஇதுஎமதுபெருமையைக்கூட்டவும்அரசியல்வன்மத்தைக்காட்டவும்செய்கிறது — Kamal Haasan (@ikamalhaasan) February 22, 2017 நமதியக்கத்தார்சற்றதிகமாககண்ணியம்காக்கும்நேரமிது. அளந்துபேசவும்தொடர்ந்துபேசவும். அரசுகள்மாறிமாறிவரினும்நம்கட்சியற்றகொள்கைமாறாது — Kamal Haasan (@ikamalhaasan) February 22, 2017 எக்கட்சிஅரசேற்றாலும்நம்பணிபோதுநலம்காப்பதே. இக்கூலியில்லாவேலையைநம்ஆயுளுள்வரைசெய்வோம். அவர்பலமுறைவருவா்போவர்.நிரந்தரம்நம்நாடு'
